@package dozens

module Network.API.Dozens.Common
data Auth
Auth :: User -> Key -> Request -> Auth
authUser :: Auth -> User
authKey :: Auth -> Key
apiBase :: Auth -> Request
data Token
data ZoneId
data Zone
Zone :: ZoneId -> ZoneName -> Zone
zoneId :: Zone -> ZoneId
zoneName :: Zone -> ZoneName
data RecordId
data RecordType
A :: RecordType
AAAA :: RecordType
CNAME :: RecordType
MX :: RecordType
TXT :: RecordType
data Record
Record :: RecordId -> ByteString -> RecordType -> Maybe Word16 -> Int -> ByteString -> Record
recordId :: Record -> RecordId
recordName :: Record -> ByteString
recordType :: Record -> RecordType
recordPriority :: Record -> Maybe Word16
recordTtl :: Record -> Int
recordBody :: Record -> ByteString
type User = ByteString
type Key = ByteString
type ZoneName = ByteString
type MailAddress = ByteString

-- | The default value for this type.
def :: Default a => a

module Network.API.Dozens.API
data GetZone
getZone :: GetZone
data CreateZone
CreateZone :: ZoneName -> Maybe ByteString -> Maybe MailAddress -> CreateZone
czZoneName :: CreateZone -> ZoneName
czGoogleAppsAuthorize :: CreateZone -> Maybe ByteString
czMailAddress :: CreateZone -> Maybe MailAddress
createZone :: CreateZone
data UpdateZone
UpdateZone :: ZoneId -> MailAddress -> UpdateZone
uzZoneId :: UpdateZone -> ZoneId
uzMailAddress :: UpdateZone -> MailAddress
updateZone :: UpdateZone
newtype DeleteZone
DeleteZone :: ZoneId -> DeleteZone
dzZoneId :: DeleteZone -> ZoneId
deleteZone :: DeleteZone
newtype GetRecords
GetRecords :: ZoneName -> GetRecords
grZoneName :: GetRecords -> ZoneName
getRecords :: GetRecords
data CreateRecord
CreateRecord :: ZoneName -> ByteString -> RecordType -> Maybe Word16 -> Maybe Int -> ByteString -> CreateRecord
crDomain :: CreateRecord -> ZoneName
crName :: CreateRecord -> ByteString
crType :: CreateRecord -> RecordType
crPriority :: CreateRecord -> Maybe Word16
crTtl :: CreateRecord -> Maybe Int
crBody :: CreateRecord -> ByteString
createRecord :: CreateRecord
data UpdateRecord
UpdateRecord :: RecordId -> Maybe Word16 -> Maybe Int -> Maybe ByteString -> UpdateRecord
urRecordId :: UpdateRecord -> RecordId
urPriority :: UpdateRecord -> Maybe Word16
urTtl :: UpdateRecord -> Maybe Int
urBody :: UpdateRecord -> Maybe ByteString
updateRecord :: UpdateRecord
newtype DeleteRecord
DeleteRecord :: RecordId -> DeleteRecord
drRecordId :: DeleteRecord -> RecordId
deleteRecord :: DeleteRecord
type User = ByteString
type Key = ByteString
type ZoneName = ByteString
type MailAddress = ByteString
instance Show GetZone
instance Read GetZone
instance Eq GetZone

module Network.API.Dozens.Explicit
authorize :: Auth -> Manager -> IO Token
fromToken :: Auth -> ByteString -> IO Token
class API a r | a -> r
run :: API a r => a -> Token -> Manager -> IO r
instance API DeleteRecord [Record]
instance API UpdateRecord [Record]
instance API CreateRecord [Record]
instance API GetRecords [Record]
instance API DeleteZone [Zone]
instance API UpdateZone [Zone]
instance API CreateZone [Zone]
instance API GetZone [Zone]

module Network.API.Dozens
data Dozens
withDozens :: MonadIO m => Auth -> (Given Dozens => m a) -> Manager -> m a
class API a r | a -> r
run :: (API a r, MonadIO m, Given Dozens) => a -> m r
instance API DeleteRecord [Record]
instance API UpdateRecord [Record]
instance API CreateRecord [Record]
instance API GetRecords [Record]
instance API DeleteZone [Zone]
